::Killfest::

Killfest frowns and raises an eyebrow. Diamond was obvioustly holding 
something back.

"Very well," he says, "If there's no one else than we have to wait 
for this Blacknightmare to respond."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She got up and stood, looking at Killfest. "If he's that easily 
> bored, he should go to the pod hanger bay. Perhaps he could remove 
> the old and scrapped pods." She said with a slight smirk.
> 
> She shook her head."I can't think of anything right now, other 
> than..." she stopped herself, "no, I can't think of anything."
